reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well and flatters their curves, with one noting how the peplum style conceals the abdomen. They appreciate its rich grape purple color, professional appearance, and comfort. The material quality receives mixed feedback - while some find it nice, others describe it as cheap. The zipper quality is negative, with multiple customers reporting it's impossible to use. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Dress for Church
items.body: Nice Quality. Fit well. Sleeves a little long. Could have worn a smaller size. Nice fabric. Read more
items.author: Daphne McDonald

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bodycon gets the Body right
items.body: Fits and hugs...but comfortable Very cute... church attire Love it...the bow could be a little stiffer Holds together in the right places Shape wear...none needed Read more
items.author: RoRo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress. You will not regret it!
items.body: This dress was purchased for my induction ceremony into my sorority, so my Line Sisters had to get the same one. This dress was absolutely beautiful on us! If you need a white dress for any reason, this is the one! Read more
items.author: Shalonda F.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Support needed for zipping
items.body: This dress had a nice fit my only problem was the zipper. It kept getting caught when being zipped. Read more
items.author: TeCola Budd

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not Peacock Blue
items.body: This is not Peacock Blue, this color is more like green, very disappointed, I ordered a different one and I hope it doesn't come back the same color, this dress does not match my shoes, very disappointed Read more
items.author: Ms. G. 04-23-60

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Casual gown /dress
items.body: True to size, the material is very soft and comfortable. The thickness of the material is wonderful. Definitely recommend, great fit for full figure structure. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The brown nice color

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully disappointed
items.body: I was so excited about this beautifully stylish dress but was disappointed upon arrival. The color and texture of the material was of good quality but the stitching was poorly done for my taste which gave it a cheap appearance. Read more
items.author: Raynetta Guest

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Blue, Burgundy, Black, Light Blue, Olive, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Lavender, White, Purple, Yellow, Peacock Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
